name: Claustrophobia (itch) (JLS_Designs)
description:
The inspiration for this games jam was an my nana's experience with claustrophobia, being trapped in a wardrobe when she was young by her brother. So the game you play as my Nan as a girl as she is lost in a giant wardrobe using your power of the light to drive back the shadows to get deeper into the Wardrobe to try and escape.  

I the default is using UE5 on Max settings so I have also included a version were everything is low except shadow which the mechanics rely on.
